sentences.sContent: You don't need a humanistic education in order to become a herdsman .
sentences.sContent_eng: You don't need a humanistic education in order to become a herdsman .
sentences.sCn: 要成为一个牧人，你不需要接受人文主义的教育。

sentences.sContent: The herdsman drove afield battening his flocks with the fresh dews of night.
sentences.sContent_eng: The herdsman drove afield battening his flocks with the fresh dews of night.
sentences.sCn: 牧人把羊群赶到野外，用夜晚的新鲜露水催肥。

sentences.sContent: The west side of every wood and rising ground gleamed like a boundary of Elysium, the sun on our backs seemed like a gentle herdsman driving us home at evening.
sentences.sContent_eng: The west side of every wood and rising ground gleamed like a boundary of Elysium, the sun on our backs seemed like a gentle herdsman driving us home at evening.
sentences.sCn: 每处林木的西边和凸起的地面流光溢彩，宛如乐园的边际，夕阳在背好似和蔼的牧人晚间赶车送我们回家。

trans.tranOther: a man who looks after a herd of animals
